segment.source: The Files tab displays the complete list of files that are included in a sequenced application package.
segment.target: The Files tab displays the complete list of files that are included in a sequenced application package.

segment.source: The left pane displays, in a standard file browse format, the complete list of files in the package that was created during the application sequencing.
segment.target: The left pane displays, in a standard file browse format, the complete list of files in the package that was created during the application sequencing.

segment.source: These files include the package root directory (the directory you specified during the application installation phase), the Virtual File System (VFS) folder, and the virtual environment files.
segment.target: These files include the package root directory (the directory you specified during the application installation phase), the Virtual File System (VFS) folder, and the virtual environment files.

segment.source: The right pane displays the file name, file attributes, and the Sequencer attributes.
segment.target: The right pane displays the file name, file attributes, and the Sequencer attributes.

segment.source: The name of the file is in the left pane.
segment.target: The name of the file is in the left pane.

segment.source: The files displayed in the left pane are created during sequencing.
segment.target: The files displayed in the left pane are created during sequencing.

segment.source: This is the name of a file selected in the left pane, written in the 8.3 format naming convention.
segment.target: This is the name of a file selected in the left pane, written in the 8.3 format naming convention.

segment.source: The size of the file in bytes.
segment.target: The size of the file in bytes.

segment.source: The version of the selected file.
segment.target: The version of the selected file.

segment.source: The date and time the selected file was created.
segment.target: The date and time the selected file was created.

segment.source: The date and time the selected file was last modified.
segment.target: The date and time the selected file was last modified.

segment.source: Select this attribute to specify that an application must retain the information of an individual user.
segment.target: Select this attribute to specify that an application must retain the information of an individual user.

segment.source: Select this attribute to specify that an application must retain the general information of a group of users.
segment.target: Select this attribute to specify that an application must retain the general information of a group of users.

segment.source: When selected, the Application Virtualization Desktop Client overwrites the corresponding file when the sequenced application package is upgraded and streamed to the client.
segment.target: When selected, the Application Virtualization Desktop Client overwrites the corresponding file when the sequenced application package is upgraded and streamed to the client.

segment.source: If this check box is not selected, the client determines whether or not to overwrite the selected file.
segment.target: If this check box is not selected, the client determines whether or not to overwrite the selected file.

segment.source: How to Modify the Files Included in a Package
segment.target: How to Modify the Files Included in a Package
